id: Kids In NYC Can Swap Out Unwanted Candy At A Reese's Converter Machine
paragraph:
Exchanges welcome.
        No tricks here. Trade in your Halloween candy for Reese's candy. What'd you expect from the GOAT of Halloween?! #ReesesCandyConverter #NotSorry https://t.co/bTrjF2IFay@reeses I’ll trade you all this candy corn for some peanut butter cups.... 😩@reeses What if the machine ran out of Reese's?@reeses I need that machine in my house! 🙌💜@reeses That's awesome wish their was one near me !! I would definitely visit it !!BuzzFeed HomeSitemap© 2018 BuzzFeed, Inc.
